mapper.select: /* FrontTendencyDAO.selectTendencyDetail*/ select d.acv_name, a.ten_text, a.acv_id, a.sub_id, a.ten_id from aigo.cb_aigo_tendency a left join aigo.cb_aigo_subject b ON ( a.sub_id=b.sub_id ) left join aigo.cb_aigo_level c ON ( a.lev_id=c.lev_id ) left join aigo.cb_aigo_achievement d ON ( a.acv_id = d.acv_id ) left join aigo.plus_user_master rum ON ( a.reg_um_seq = rum.um_seq ) left join aigo.plus_user_master uum ON ( a.udt_um_seq = uum.um_seq ) where 1 = 1 and a.acv_id = #{acvId}
